title: Sibling Watchery - Drag Race UK Season 3 - Episode 10
description:
This week on Sibling Watchery, Monét is joined by the one and only Tia Kofi!! The two dive into the Season 3 finale of Drag Race UK and as always they are not holding back. Tune in to hear all the hot takes on the queen's final looks and performances of the season.
For a limited time, we’ve partnered with Current to give away $1,000! That’s right, Current is giving away $250 to four listeners of this show. All you have to do is download the Current app and enter our code SIBLING during sign up before December 15th for a chance to win! Download the Current app, sign up in less than two minutes, and enter SIBLING for a chance to win $250! No purchase is necessary to win, purchase won’t increase chances of winning. Void where prohibited, eligibility restrictions apply. visit current.com/sibling for full Terms and Conditions.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
